    • Method Detail

      • getBooleanValue

        protected boolean getBooleanValue(java.lang.String key,
                                  boolean defaultValue)
        Parameters:
        key - the key for the desired value
        defaultValue - the default value to return if the key is not found in the configuration cache or XML
        Returns:
        the value for the given key if found in either the configuration cache (if the key has already been retrieved), the override cache (if the override key is present in cache), or the XML. Returns defaultValue if not found in these locations

        Parameters:

        defaultValue - the default value to return if the key is not found in the configuration cache or XML
        Returns:
        the value for the given key if found in either the configuration cache (if the key has already been retrieved), the override cache (if the override key is present in cache), or the XML.

        defaultValue - the default value to return if the key is not found in the configuration cache or XML
        Returns:

      • readStringArrayResourceValue

        protected java.lang.String[] readStringArrayResourceValue(java.lang.String key,
                                                          java.lang.String[] defaultValue)
        Reads a string-array from XML. See http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/string-resource.html.
        Parameters:
        key - the key for the desired value
        defaultValue - the default value to return if the key is not found in XML
        Returns:
